articles.author: Andrew Martin, Ryan Gould, Brody Ford
articles.title: ServiceNow Nears Up to $7 Billion Deal for Armis - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: ServiceNow Inc. is in advanced talks to buy the cybersecurity startup Armis in a deal that may be valued at as much as $7 billion and would represent the tech company’s largest acquisition to date.
articles.content:
ServiceNow Inc.is in advanced talks to buy the cybersecurity startup Armis in a deal that may be valued at as much as $7 billion and would represent the tech companys largest acquisition to date.

articles.author: Lauren Floyd
articles.title: U.S. unseals warrant behind oil tanker seizure near Venezuela - Axios
articles.description: The FBI director said the bureau will keep enforcing U.S. sanctions and "cut off our adversaries from financial markets" and tech.
articles.content:
• The sanctions escalate the Trump administration's campaign to choke off what it calls illicit oil flows tied to Iran and Maduro's government in Caracas.
